00023 var W = {
00024   // the absolute path where platform installed; manually specify the installed
00025   // URI to bypass the W.autopath() function running on initialization
00026   path: '',
00027   // version info
00028   version: '0.1.1',
00029   // document.getElementById() shortcut
00030   $: function(id){return document.getElementById(id);},
00042   js: function(url){
00043     if(!document.body)
00044       document.write('<div id="_wednus_platform_" style="display:none;'
00045       +'position:absolute;">.</div>');
00046     document.write('<script type="text/javascript" src="'+ url +'"><\/script>');
00047     document.close();
00048   },
00063   autopath: function(){
00064     // path has manually set
00065     if(this.path != '')
00066       return true;
00067     // get installation path
00068     if(document.getElementsByTagName){
00069       var scripts = document.getElementsByTagName('script');
00070       for(var i = 0; i < scripts.length; ++i){
00071         if(scripts[i].src.match(/\bwednus\.js$/i) || scripts[i].src.match(/\bwednus_compact\.js$/i)){
00072           this.path = scripts[i].src.substring(0, scripts[i].src.lastIndexOf('/') + 1);
00073           // terminate the search at the first match
00074           return true;
00075         // check the 'wednus.js?only' keyword
00076         }else if(scripts[i].src.match(/\bwednus\.js\?only$/i)){
00077           this.path = scripts[i].src.substring(0, scripts[i].src.lastIndexOf('/') + 1);
00078           // properly detected the path, but since we use the return value of this
00079           // function as the marker for further module loading, we set this as
00080           // 'false' to stop at this point.
00081           return false;
00082         }
00083       }
00084     }
00085     // not able to get the path info.
00086     document.write('This browser does not support the basic DOM level1.\nTo '
00087       +'support this browser, the author of this page needs to set "W.path" to the '
00088       +'installation path(URL) of Wednus Platform manually. Meanwhile, the '
00089       +'platform will be unloaded. \nWe are sorry for this.\n\nWednus team.');
00090     document.close();
00091     // unregister the 'W' namespace
00092     W = null;
00093     return false;
00094   }
00095 };

00111 W.load = function(subpath, name, lib){  // script loader
00112   lib = lib?lib:'include';
00113   // pool for loaded modules(includes module/control/app/snippet
00114   this.modules = {};
00115   // create lib if it's not added already
00116   if(!this.modules[lib])
00117     this.modules[lib] = [];
00118   // do batch load when name is a comma seperated list
00119   name = name.split(',');
00120   if(name.length != 1){
00121     for(var i = 0; i < name.length; ++i)
00122         this.load(subpath, name[i], lib);
00123     return;
00124   }
00125   // maintain the module library: register only when it's not loaded yet
00126   if(getIndex(lib, name) != -1){
00127     return;
00128   }else this.modules[lib][this.modules[lib].length] = name +'';
00129   // load module
00130   this.js(this.path + subpath + '/'+ name +'.js');
00131 
00132   // search any previous loading
00133   function getIndex(lib, name){
00134     for(var i = 0; i < W.modules[lib].length; ++i)
00135       if(W.modules[lib][i] == name)
00136         return i;
00137     return -1;
00138   };
00139 };

00148 W.css = function(url){
00149   document.write('<link href="'+ url +'" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">');
00150   document.close();
00151 };

00158     // dkernel module provides the methods for visual tasks

00166     if(!e) e = window.event;
00167     W.key = e.keyCode;
00168   };
